skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Pamiat Merkuria, protected cruiser. I was a bigshot in the Black Sea Fleet during the great war, beating up baddies left and right, and I even fought alongside Avrora in a world war! I'm charismatic, experienced, and cute - all the things YOU aren't!
skins.acquisition: Yoohoo, Commander! I'm *the* Pamiat Merkuria, light cruiser from the Northern Parliament! Nice meeting you! Do your thing and work your butt off for me?
skins.login: Yoohoo, Commander! What task are we starting today with?
skins.details: Believe it or not, but I'm from the same era as Avrora and Mikasa! So, you know what you oughta do as the commander here, don'tcha?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Avrora, could you go buy me a new game? Hmm, fine... Then how about the Commander instead? What do you say to that, Commander~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Secretary work, eh... Like, I'm happy to work hard for you and all, but wouldn't it make you even happier to work hard for me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's embarrassing how I'm staring at you constantly? Well, I don't feel embarrassed, so who cares~ Hahah!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ah, "getting personal," are we? Hehehe~ Where do you wanna touch me, huh~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You really like 'em... *big*, huh? You creep?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: What are you doing? Didn't Mikasa teach you to respect girls with rich histories?

skins.shipDescription: What kinda exercise is this?! Nobody said I'd become a dang showpiece! Come on, get this thing off me, *now*!
skins.acquisition: What kinda exercise is this?! Nobody said I'd become a dang showpiece! Come on, get this thing off me, NOW!
skins.login: Ughh... Why am I here, just to suffer...?
skins.details: Umm... Is it just me, or are these mockup cell bars way too strong? Dangit, I just hope Gangut comes and rescues me soon...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I have a big backlog of games to play... I'd really like to go home and work on it! Please? Please!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Something smells gooood... So what if I had snacks merely 30 minutes ago? I have a needy stomach!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Grrr... I'm on my last dang legs here... Grrrr...
skins.secretaryTouch: Urgh...! Don't go touching wherever you want just 'cause I can't move...!
